Burning Blood.description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

Ring of the Snake.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Cracked Core.description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Lightning.

Pure Water.description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.

Akabeko.description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

Ancient Tea Set.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy.

Art of War.description: If you do not play an Attack during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

Bag of Marbles.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Bag of Preparation.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Blood Vial.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

Bronze Scales.description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

Centennial Puzzle.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

Ceramic Fish.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

Dream Catcher.description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.

Juzu Bracelet.description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

Lantern.description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

Maw Bank.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. Loses its effect if you spend any Gold at a Shop.

Meal Ticket.description: Whenever you enter a Shop, heal 15 HP.

Nunchaku.description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.

Omamori.description: Negate the next 2 Curses you would obtain.

Orichalcum.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

Pen Nib.description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

Regal Pillow.description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.

Smiling Mask.description: The cost to remove cards at a shop is 50 Gold.

The Boot.description: Whenever you deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.

Tiny Chest.description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.

Toy Ornithopter.description: Whenever you use a Potion, heal 5 HP.

Blue Candle.description: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.

Bottled Flame.description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Bottled Lightning.description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Bottled Tornado.description: Upon pickup, choose a Power. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

Darkstone Periapt.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, raise your Max HP by 6.

Eternal Feather.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, heal 3 HP for every 5 cards in your deck.

Frozen Egg.description: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is upgraded.

Gremlin Horn.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

Horn Cleat.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.

Ink Bottle.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.

Kunai.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

Letter Opener.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

Matryoshka.description: The next 2 non-boss chests you open contain 2 relics.

Meat on the Bone.description: If your HP is at 50% or less at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Mercury Hourglass.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Molten Egg.description: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is upgraded.

Mummified Hand.description: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.

Ornamental Fan.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

Pantograph.description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.

Paper Frog.description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

Question Card.description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.

Shuriken.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

Singing Bowl.description: When adding cards to your deck, you may gain +2 Max HP instead.

Sundial.description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain 2 Energy.

Toxic Egg.description: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is upgraded.

Bird-Faced Urn.description: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.

Calipers.description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block instead of all of your Block.

Captain's Wheel.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

Dead Branch.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

Du-Vu Doll.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

Fossilized Helix.description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP in each combat.

Gambling Chip.description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

Ginger.description: You can no longer become Weakened.

Girya.description: Upon pickup, you can gain 1 Strength 3 times at Rest Sites.

Ice Cream.description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

Lizard Tail.description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead. (Works Once)

Peace Pipe.description: You can now remove cards at Rest Sites.

Pocketwatch.description: Whenever you play 3 or fewer cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

Prayer Wheel.description: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.

Shovel.description: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.

Stone Calendar.description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.

The Courier.description: The Merchant now sells Potions and Card Removal services, and his prices are reduced by 20%.

Thread and Needle.description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

Torii.description: Whenever you receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.

Tungsten Rod.description: Whenever you lose HP, lose 1 less.

Turnip.description: You can no longer become Frailed.

Unceasing Top.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

Astrolabe.description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

Black Blood.description: At the end of combat, heal 12 HP instead of 6.

Busted Crown.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You have 2 less cards to choose from in card rewards.

Calling Bell.description: Upon pickup, obtain 3 relics and 3 Curses.

Coffee Dripper.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.

Cursed Key.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse.

Ectoplasm.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

Empty Cage.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

Fusion Hammer.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

Holy Water.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles to your hand.

Hovering Kite.description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy.

Mark of Pain.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. At the start of each combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.

Nuclear Battery.description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Plasma.

Philosopher's Stone.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength.

Ring of the Serpent.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

Runic Cube.description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

Runic Dome.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

Runic Pyramid.description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

Slavers Collar.description: During Boss and Elite combats, gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

Snecko Eye.description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. At the start of your turn, randomize the cost of all cards in your hand.

Sozu.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain Potions.

Tiny House.description: Obtain 1 Potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card.

Velvet Choker.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

Violet Lotus.description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional 1 Energy.

Wrist Blade.description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.

Cauldron.description: Upon pickup, choose 5 Potions to add to your inventory.

Chemical X.description: Whenever you play an X cost card, its effects are increased by 2.

Clockwork Souvenir.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact.

Dolly's Mirror.description: Upon pickup, obtain a copy of a card in your deck.

Frozen Eye.description: When viewing your Draw Pile, it is now shown in order.

Hand Drill.description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

Lee's Waffle.description: Raise your Max HP by 7. Heal all HP.

Medical Kit.description: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.

Membership Card.description: 50% discount on all items at the Shop.

Orange Pellets.description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your Debuffs.

Orrery.description: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

Prismatic Shard.description: Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards and cards from other colors.

Sling of Courage.description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

Strange Spoon.description: Cards that Exhaust will instead discard 50% of the time.

The Abacus.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.

Toolbox.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 Colorless cards to add to your hand.
